title: I want to remove my level 7 main from my profile
body: * 1. I have a lot of points in yasuo lvl 7, but that was a long time ago... how can i remove the points?{{champion:157}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure how it could affect your account overall, but go ahead and hit up our game agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if this is someone they can adjust or not!
